_sText: I continued working on my beta1 map and this is the result! Lighting, background sound, new Last Requests and much more has been added! The Last Requests on this map are: - GunToss - JumpShot - Shot4Shot - SprayContest - Knive Arena - Chicken Fight - Chances - Bomb Plant - Basketball: 3 tries, most goals wins - Dices: Highest wins - Dices: Higher/Lower - Roulette: 3/16 chance to die I personally think this looks pretty good, but if you disagree and/or have tips, tricks, bug reports or anything else to say to me about this map, please comment! It only takes 30 seconds and you help me out allot! Your feedback is much appreciated. Updated: I removed a small bug with the Dices and added a ladder to get out of the pit!
